short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hey, now you can use any image on the web as background for new chrome tab? just give the absolute image url and that's it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On downloading the extention it will change the chrome new tab interface with any random nature image either you can keep it as it is or customise with your own image, for that just click on the icon of the extention and submit a url of the image you want to use as chrome new tab interface make sure to give the absolute url of the image which directly opens the image.
